Description: Repeatetly farm jade oni for spirtual spellements, one shot duels, wooden/stone keys, holiday event gear

--> Complete quest "Rematch" given by the "Jade Champion" inside of "Throne Room" on at least 1 of your client(s)
--> Please make sure all client(s) are inside the "Throne Room" before starting the program

Side Note
	- Jade oni can "Weakness"
	- Jade oni can "Black Mantle"
	- Jade oni can "Death Shield"
